items.sentence: Let\'s conserve our limited water resources.
Let\'s consider the worst that could happen.
Let\'s hope this time common sense prevails.
Your wish will come true in the near future.
I put a clean towel in the bathroom for you.
I really need to talk to Tom sometime today.
Tom told me who you were asking to the prom.
Tom told the taxi driver to keep the change.
Tom told us another one of his stupid jokes.
Tom took a handful of popcorn from the bowl.
She advised him to go to the police station.
She was advised by him to come back at once.
She was advised by him to get more exercise.
The bus was late because of the traffic jam.
The girl who lives next door is very pretty.
Tom dropped out of school to work full-time.
If it was easy, it wouldn\'t be a challenge.
Tom can do a lot of things that I can\'t do.
Tom can\'t hide the truth from Mary anymore.
Tom complained that he couldn\'t find a job.
